Question: Originally a research chemist before becoming a barrister, this person was elected Member of Parliament (MP) for Finchley in 1959.
Hints: Denis **** was made a Baronet at the same time.
Polls suggested that fewer than one in three British citizens approved of this person's decision.
This person was born Margaret Hilda Roberts in Grantham, Lincolnshire, on 13 October 1925.
